title: TECNO CAMON 12 Air: An absolute Stunner & Affordable
text:
Buying a phone these days is definitely all about expression of your personal style. The first thing you will ever notice in someone’s phone is its looks.

Then you will draw a judgement about that person’s stylishness according to the appearance of their phone.Inshort, your phone is your style statement.

These days you cannot even imagine buying a phone that features premium looks without breaking your bank. Thankfully, it is now possible with TECNO phones.

TECNO’s latest CAMON 12 Air comes with an impressive, refined design. It is really hard to tell by the looks of the phone that it is a budget phone. Tech influencers have given their opinion about the looks of the phone by saying the phone is crafted carefully to get the desired premium look.

When it comes to smartphones, TECNO has achieved a special place in Pakistani market. The brand is known for not only bringing wide range of products in different price range but has also managed to bring flagship features in mid-range phones. This has helped the brand create solid brand positioning.

TECNO is known for bringing finest and trendy designs that do not look like just any other phone available in the market. Their latest offering in Camon Series, Camon 12 Air is not only brilliant in terms of design but is also performance packed device.

The very first glance at the phone will confirm the fact that the phone has spectacular looks. Let’s have a detailed understanding of all the features that contribute towards giving the phone impressive looks. The phone comes with 6.55-inch HD++ display with 90.3 percent screen-to-body ratio. The integration of latest screen technology which is the use of in-screen hole-punch helps minimize bezels.

The phone comes in Bay Blue and Stellar Purple colours. The phone is powered by an Octa-core MediaTek Helio P22 SoC.The phone has an incredibly fast and accurateFace ID unlock feature which ensures that user of the phone can stay stress free regarding access to his personal data.

The phone features a triple rear camera set up (16MP+5MP+2MP) for taking clear photos. The phone comes equipped with 8MP selfie camera.

Camon 12 Air has got the style. It has got extraordinary specs. It is simply the latest device getting popular with every passing second.
